name: Anna
greetingText: I'm so sorry for not remembering your b'day!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy 50th birthday to you!! Yeee! You always owe my blessings...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are the more Special one for meee from being a brother to bestie
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Hope I may have filled little smile on your face
